product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

product_name: Bellavita White Oud ,Long Lasting,Unisex Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)

Charmed by the tangy Artemisian Lemon at the top, delicately distinct freesias at its heart amidst the enchanting amber and musk at its base, The White Oud is a revelation of all things 'sweet' and 'spice'! This is a blend of extremes, where the best of both worlds come together to create a perennially calming experience!"""

product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.
comment: Not good why rating was so good

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum Fire 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Spread the FIRE around with an aromatic woody blend of patchouli, opulent spices & white musk. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE FIRE EDP's unique blend of woody and musky notes makes it ideal for use at a date night or an all night party with friends. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists.
comment: Amazing perfume with noticeable fragrance, the quality is very good with long lasting refreshing fragrance, really happy with my purchase.

product_name: Bellavita Date Perfume for Women || Notes of Pink Pepper, Red Fruits - Eau De Parfum Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: DATE Woman by Bella Vita is a celebration of love and romance. The perfume has top notes of Pink Pepper and Red Fruits. At its heart, lies the trio of Jasmine, Orange Blossom and Violet, perfect for a romantic date. The base notes are Moss, Musk and Powdery, balanced by the sweetness of Vanilla to create an unforgettable moment.
comment: I ordered this for my wife. The fragrance is good. It last long upto 8-10 hours. Few sprays can simply uplift the mood. Base note is mesmerising. Travel friendly , can be carried and used well.

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: Envy Red Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Opulence Discover Envy Opulence, a floral and fruity fragrance that exudes elegance. Sicilian lemon oil, apple cider, and bell flowers create a dazzling top note, while green bamboo, white rose, and jasmine form a captivating middle note. The fragrance culminates in a base of white musk, cedar, and amber, enveloping you in a luxurious aura. 2. Bewitch Let yourself be captivated by Envy Bewitch, a romantic fragrance with a mesmerizing marine accord. Opening with a delightful blend of apple, marine notes, rose, and plum, balanced by aromatic undertones and a soothing sandalwood base, it casts an enchanting spell that lingers. 3. Radiant Radiate confidence with Envy Radiant, a floral and fruity fragrance that dazzles the senses. The top notes of pear, grapefruit oil, and lemon oil create a vibrant opening, leading to a heart of Turkish rose, magnolia flowers, and white flowers. The fragrance settles into a base of white musk, patchouli oil, and vanilla, leaving a lingering and captivating trail. 4. Enchant Indulge in the pure essence of Envy Enchant, an exquisite fragrance for women. It unveils a captivating combination of orange blossom and jasmine, embraced by sweet honey notes and delicate florals. The base of patchouli, cedar, and rosy accords adds an enchanting touch to this truly captivating scent.

The fragrance culminates in a base of white musk, cedar, and amber, enveloping you in a luxurious aura. 2. Bewitch Let yourself be captivated by Envy Bewitch, a romantic fragrance with a mesmerizing marine accord. Opening with a delightful blend of apple, marine notes, rose, and plum, balanced by aromatic undertones and a soothing sandalwood base, it casts an enchanting spell that lingers. 3. Radiant Radiate confidence with Envy Radiant, a floral and fruity fragrance that dazzles the senses. The top notes of pear, grapefruit oil, and lemon oil create a vibrant opening, leading to a heart of Turkish rose, magnolia flowers, and white flowers. The fragrance settles into a base of white musk, patchouli oil, and vanilla, leaving a lingering and captivating trail. 4. Enchant Indulge in the pure essence of Envy Enchant, an exquisite fragrance for women. It unveils a captivating combination of orange blossom and jasmine, embraced by sweet honey notes and delicate florals. The base of patchouli, cedar, and rosy accords adds an enchanting touch to this truly captivating scent.

product_name: RAMSONS U R Sweet & Lovely Pack of 2 Eau de Parfum - 60 ml  (For Women)
description: Ramsons U.R.Sweet is an exuberant coalescence of amber, musk, sandalwood and vanilla at the base, enriched with honey and cinnamon at the heart. This sweet smelling fragrance is a fruity and floral delight exuding a captivating fragrance all day long. Enjoy this overwhelmingly majestic eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Sweet”. Ramsons U.R.Lovely is a testimony to floral exuberance thanks to its exotic fusion of jasmine, rose and tuberose at the heart. This woody and fresh fragrance has the finest quality of amber, musk and vanilla at the base, with a dash of green to make it more refreshing. Flaunt this unbelievably alluring eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Lovely”.

product_name: Engage Luxury Unisex Perfume Gift Set, Pack of 4 (25mlx4), Travel Sized, Assorted Pack Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: Engage Yin is a premium for the modern and suave men. It has a hearty concoction of bergamot and blackcurrant in the top notes with an amber, patchouli woody trail, masculinity in a bottle. Engage Homme is a premium and complex fragrance for the modern man who follows his instincts. The dazzling notes of bergamot combined with herbal notes compose an intense, aromatic earthy blend with patchouli. The scent develops on a warm, woody base of oak moss and sandalwood, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and virility. Engage Yang is a perfect blend of fruity and floral notes, making it perfect for any woman who wants to reveal her sophisticated femininity. Top notes of blackcurrant, mandarin, and apple give it a juicy and lively opening, while the middle notes of jasmine, rose, and orange flowers add a romantic and floral depth. As it dries down, the bottom notes of musk and sandalwood give it a warm and alluring finish. Engage Femme is a premium perfume with fresh peppy citrus notes on an aromatic floral base, warmed by a base of amber and woods that celebrates femininity.
comment: Very nice product and very nice fragrance super product I have ever buy any other perfumes

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

product_name: THE MAN COMPANY Blanc, Night, Fire & Oud 20ml Gift Set|A Gentleman's Mood Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Here is your chance to indulge your senses with four luxurious fragrances in one go. We believe a true gentleman deserves nothing less than the best, and we deliver just that with our premium fragrance gift set - A Gentleman's Moods. A perfect boardroom fragrance, Blanc, boasts crisp notes that command respect and exude confidence. In all senses, it is the scent of success. A perfect accompaniment for laidback evenings and casual parties, Night, keeps the nights always young with its elegant and refined notes. With its woody notes and sensual undertones, Fire is the ultimate choice to ignite the party animal vibe. An opulent scent that captures the essence of celebrations, Oud, is what it feels like to wear the festive grandeur.

product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

product_name: Wild Stone CODE Acqua Long Lasting for Men, Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: A scent that takes you on a journey through the ocean, to a place where time stands still and the world fades away. The exquisite marine notes instantly transport you back to your favourite explorations, to the salty sea air and to the sound of waves crashing against the shore. With every breath, you'll be immersed in the fresh and invigorating aroma of ocean mist, and the crisp and clean scent of seawater. The top notes of bergamot and lemon add a hint of citrus, while the heart notes of marine accords and jasmine give the scent a subtle floral touch. The base notes of amber, moss, and musk add depth and complexity, making ACQUA a truly unique and memorable fragrance. Lose yourself in the endless blue of the ocean with ACQUA. It's a scent that captures the essence of adventure, freedom and wanderlust, and it will remind you of the most exhilarating moments of your life. So why not let the ACQUA take you on a journey, where time is meaningless.
comment: Doesn't stay longer at this big price

Whether expressing newfound affection or celebrating years together, this Perfume Collection adds a touch of sophistication to the language of love.

comment: This is the second consecutive time I am buying this product and there is absolutely no regrets. product_name: Bellavita Fresh Eau De Toilette Unisex Perfume with Bergamot, Orris Lavender & Ylang Ylang Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: Twisted Tale of Modern Classic.A mythical fragrance that rephrases ancient elegance! Accents of almond and Bergamot at the top, are accentuated by lavender at its heart and ylang-ylang at its base, to manifest an irresistibly iconic appeal. A breath of Fresh air, this Eau De Toilette beautifully revives the glorious memories of the past; full of purity and versatility yet evoking limitless opportunities for the future!

A debonair charm definitely attracts those around the rugged and brooding males, when they strut with a whiff of masculine smelling air.
Fruity Amber, Green Citrus and Woody Fragrance
Imbibing the freshness of fruity amber, green citrus and woody fragrance, Wild Stone is a great addition to any man’s collection of perfumes and spreads the appealing and sensual scent around.

The irresistibly masculine and sparkling energetic, Hydra Energy Eau de Parfum elevates your mood and helps you steal those second glances wherever you go.

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum ICE 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists
comment: The perfume is very nice and has a very pleasant fragrance. Its's provide a cooling effect. It is last long all day. Best for office and casual day.. must buy

comment:
If you're in doubt.. here is a review:-
I got it for like 209/-😂😂
Let me tell you.. this one is very very great..
The smell is fruity and very feminine..

-soft fruity feminine fragrance(not overpowering)
-long lasting(7-8 hrs)
-good quantity(100ml)

And this fragrance is very pop...

I recently acquired this, and I must say, it has been an enchanting olfactory journey.
What truly sets this perfume apart is its exceptional longevity. From morning till evening, the fragrance evolves gracefully, transitioning from agarwood to Balsamic Benzoin spices and saffron and finally resting on the elegant base notes. The complexity and balance of the scent truly shine as the day progresses.
The sillage is moderate, projecting confidently without overpowering the senses. This makes it ...

description: 'Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. description: Dark, Daring & Desirable, Villain Rebel Combo consists of four strong, unique, and long-lasting 20ml fragrances that bring out the beast in you. One for each mood, Villain Eau De Parfum 20ml is for the classy demeanor, while Villain Oud Eau De Parfum 20ml will bring out your seductive instincts. Then, we have Villain Snake Eau De Parfum 20ml to help you embrace your inner wickedness, and Villain Hydra Eau De Parfum 20ml will give you instant freshness, anytime and anywhere. Dare to revolt every single day with Villain Rebel Combo and keep your villainous vibe alive!

product_name: Plum BodyLovin' Vanilla Vibes | Long Lasting Vanilla Fragrance | Luxury Perfume | Eau de Parfum - 15 ml  (For Women)
description: The decadent, lip smackin' Vanilla goodness in this perfume body spray is so irrsistible, you'll almost forget that this is a fragrance, not a vanilla cupcake! Smell like delectable vanilla that's sweet, warm, cozy... basically like a fresh smellin' bakery on a winter morning. A long lasting perfume that's gonna be your next signature, it' the perfect daily wear winter fragrance, that's also works well all-year round. This bestselling fragrance comes in a cute, purse friendly pack so you can feel the vanilla vibes take over, quite literally!

product_name: Bellavita CEO MAN Eau De Parfum For Men, Long Lasting Notes of Tonka, Agarwood & Ambergris Eau de Parfum - 20 ml  (For Men)
description: """Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. This perfume honours your debonair and charismatic personality, allowing you to be true to yourself, just with the 'CEO' touch added to it! """

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum Fire 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Spread the FIRE around with an aromatic woody blend of patchouli, opulent spices & white musk. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE FIRE EDP's unique blend of woody and musky notes makes it ideal for use at a date night or an all night party with friends. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists.
comment: Amazing perfume with noticeable fragrance, the quality is very good with long lasting refreshing fragrance, really happy with my purchase.

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

Each scent is a perfect match for modern, confident women and men who are not afraid to indulge in the finer things of life.
comment: I like the design.. So gifted to my childhood friend ❤anu❤

product_name: SKINN by TITAN Raw - Single Pack Eau de Parfum - 20 ml  (For Men)
description: The first shower of rain on a hot summer day is synonymous with freshness, bringing about a sense of rejuvenation. Raw draws its inspiration from this, carefully balancing the fresh with the bold. This fragrance is created with crisp citrus notes that exude vitality and the warm woody notes that reflect masculinity, the top notes of this being fresh and crisp. Citrus notes such as bergamot and lemon from Italy, with a watery effect, will give you freshness to clear your mind. The heart notes of Raw bring true distinction with floral tones, and violet leaves, and geranium. The dry down of Raw will rest on your skin all day long. A blend of beautiful woods. A precious combination of Patchouli from Indonesia, and Gaiac wood.It is skin-friendly since it is dermatologically tested.
comment: Good perfume !! smell is very good

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

product_name: La French Mood Swing Eau de Parfum , 100ml For Men and Women Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: La French Mood Swing is an enticing fragrance evoking confidence and a seductive charm. The nose behind this fragrance is French Fragrance. This Premium fragrance captivates you with deep notes of Bergamot, Aromatic Pink Pepper. Middle notes are of RHubarb, Freesia, Pimento following with base notes of Tonka Bean, Vanilla and White Musk. The Bottle is Charming and the fragrance enchanting, adding up to the perfect mix for the perfect personality. Brand with a Premium Heritage acquired through over many years of experience and know-how in the art of perfumery, La French Perfumes Lordly presents the Excellent collection of Ultra Modern fragrances with Enthralling scents. Perfecting the science, art and craft of redolence, the brand believes that well-crafted fragrances say a lot about you and the way you emerge yourself.
comment: It is a very nice fragrance. It is very attractive. It comes in a beautiful looking bottle. It is of premium quality too. Very long lasting perfume.

The Bottle is Charming and the fragrance enchanting, adding up to the perfect mix for the perfect personality. Brand with a Premium Heritage acquired through over many years of experience and know-how in the art of perfumery, La French Perfumes Lordly presents the Excellent collection of Ultra Modern fragrances with Enthralling scents. Perfecting the science, art and craft of redolence, the brand believes that well-crafted fragrances say a lot about you and the way you emerge yourself.

product_name: THE MAN COMPANY Black EDT Premium Long Lasting Perfume for men Eau de Toilette - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: EDT or Eau de Toilette is your best pal. Whether you are travelling, going to the office for an urgent meeting, or spending a laid-back Sunday at a friend's place, a versatile EDT will never fail you. The perfume-based EDT is one of the most elite perfumes for men, launched by a brand recently. Travel-friendly, you can carry the EDT Black with you, anywhere. The 50ml bottle comes in a fascinating phial packing. A simple dab on the key points is enough for effect to set in. What makes it an obvious choice is the masculine undertone that remains with you for the rest of the day. Top Note: Lemon Lemon makes for a refreshing top note that keeps your spirit high and uplifted as soon as you wear the fragrance. Middle Note: Lavender Lavender has a calming floral note that gives your fragrance a fresh yet spicy feel. Base Note: Amberwood Amberwood is a masterpiece ingredient that adds a woody and powdery vibe to your perfume.

product_name: Envy Red Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Opulence Discover Envy Opulence, a floral and fruity fragrance that exudes elegance. Sicilian lemon oil, apple cider, and bell flowers create a dazzling top note, while green bamboo, white rose, and jasmine form a captivating middle note. The fragrance culminates in a base of white musk, cedar, and amber, enveloping you in a luxurious aura. 2. Bewitch Let yourself be captivated by Envy Bewitch, a romantic fragrance with a mesmerizing marine accord. Opening with a delightful blend of apple, marine notes, rose, and plum, balanced by aromatic undertones and a soothing sandalwood base, it casts an enchanting spell that lingers. 3. Radiant Radiate confidence with Envy Radiant, a floral and fruity fragrance that dazzles the senses. The top notes of pear, grapefruit oil, and lemon oil create a vibrant opening, leading to a heart of Turkish rose, magnolia flowers, and white flowers. The fragrance settles into a base of white musk, patchouli oil, and vanilla, leaving a lingering and captivating trail. 4. Enchant Indulge in the pure essence of Envy Enchant, an exquisite fragrance for women. It unveils a captivating combination of orange blossom and jasmine, embraced by sweet honey notes and delicate florals. The base of patchouli, cedar, and rosy accords adds an enchanting touch to this truly captivating scent.

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum ICE 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists

With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists
comment:
Wonderful product in this range... Fragrance is fabulous...
Too good..
Definately go for it

product_name: MOODY Perfume Gift Set of 4 Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Enjoy these fragrances for a delightful 8 hours, ensuring you smell fantastic all day long. This set includes four unique scents, perfect for the modern man and his unique moods: 1> Cedar Spice: A Warm and Intense blend, perfect for a dinner date. 2> Amber Oudh: Embrace the Smokey and Exotic essence, ideal for events and parties. 3> Citrus Musk: A Zesty and Musky classic choice, perfect for your workday. 4> Aquatic Breeze: Fresh and Tranquil, suitable for travel and workouts. Crafted by one of the world's leading perfumers, each perfume in this set is an Eau De Parfum (EDP) with a 20% perfume oil concentration, promising a long-lasting and joyful fragrance. Ideal for gifting or simply treating yourself to a touch of daily luxury.
comment: Perfume set is too good. Its has a four amazing fragrance. Long lasting and packing is impressive.

product_name: RAMSONS U R Sweet & U R Lovely Pack of 2 Eau de Parfum - 60 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: Ramsons U.R.Sweet is a classic combination of musk, amber, wood and vanilla at the base, enriched with honey, jasmine, rose, and lily at the heart. This sweet-smelling floral fragrance is given a fruity punch with a dash of peach, plum, and orange. Enjoy this overwhelmingly majestic eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Sweet”. Ramsons U.R.Lovely is a testimony to floral and spicy exuberance thanks to its exotic fusion of jasmine, rose, lily, violet, and cinnamon. This warm, woody, and sweet-smelling scent has the finest quality of musk and vanilla at the base, with a dash of bergamot, orange, grapefruit, and peach to make it more refreshing. Flaunt this unbelievably alluring eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Lovely”.

This sweet-smelling floral fragrance is given a fruity punch with a dash of peach, plum, and orange. Enjoy this overwhelmingly majestic eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Sweet”. Ramsons U.R.Lovely is a testimony to floral and spicy exuberance thanks to its exotic fusion of jasmine, rose, lily, violet, and cinnamon. This warm, woody, and sweet-smelling scent has the finest quality of musk and vanilla at the base, with a dash of bergamot, orange, grapefruit, and peach to make it more refreshing. Flaunt this unbelievably alluring eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Lovely”.
comment: Beautiful, excellent, marvelous, fantastic, magnificent, awesome.......

product_name: Bellavita CEO MAN Eau De Parfum,Long Lasting Notes of Tonka,Agarwood & Ambergris Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: 'Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. This perfume honours your debonair and charismatic personality, allowing you to be true to yourself, just with the 'CEO' touch added to it! "
comment: Great perfume at this price . Absolutely value for money.

With its powerful and masculine features combined together, this esp. has strong and invigorating notes of amber intertwined with mandarin, with a hint of woody and musky notes. It opens with a fresh citrus and mandarin note followed by a sweet, spicy like nutmeg and cinnamon. Its 3 layered notes unwrap with time and its the perfect companion for a man obsessed with new voyages!.

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

comment: First time I am buying any perfume and The Masculine impact is evident. Good fragrence at good price. Definitely Worth buying. Flipkart delivered this within 2 days. Also the fragrence lasts fairly long. I will recommend this to everybody.

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum Fire 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Spread the FIRE around with an aromatic woody blend of patchouli, opulent spices & white musk. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE FIRE EDP's unique blend of woody and musky notes makes it ideal for use at a date night or an all night party with friends. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists.

product_name: Bellavita Senorita Perfume For Woman, Fresh and Fruity Long Lasting Scent || Eau De Parfum Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: Take a stroll through the mesmerizing and romantic aroma of Senorita by Bella Vita. The perfume is infused with top notes of Yuzu, Pomegranate and Mint along with Peony, Lotus and Magnolia at its heart. The perfume is infused with top notes of Yuzu, Pomegranate and Mint along with Peony, Lotus and Magnolia at its heart. At the base, Musk, Mahogany and Amber add the perfect balance, enhancing longevity for a sensual start to the day.
comment: One of the best perfumes I have ever used. It has a soothing and pleasant fragrance

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

product_name: Plum BodyLovin' Hawaiian Rumba | Long Lasting Beachy Fragrance | Luxury Perfume | Eau de Parfum - 15 ml  (For Women)
description: Picture this: you, a cocktail, and the beach. Dreamin' already? Just one spritz of this summery fragrance and you're in paradise. Sip on piña coladas with each spray of this mini perfume & get ready to be transported to the sandy shores of Hawaii. With a refreshing citrus twist on a classic summer vacay & a flirtatious twist of Vanilla & Gardenia, this bestselling fragrance from Plum BodyLovin' is gonna be your newest signature scent. Sun, sand 'n beaches galore, this perfume body spray is all thing luxurious 'n iconic. Super chic yet affordable, this fragrance comes in a purse friendly bottle that you can carry with you on-the-go or on your beachy adventures!
comment:
Beautiful beautiful beautiful beautiful smell... must buy without any doubts
Better deal on mrp... and pocket friendly

product_name: Bellavita Senorita Perfume For Woman, Fresh and Fruity Long Lasting Scent || Eau De Parfum Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: Take a stroll through the mesmerizing and romantic aroma of Senorita by Bella Vita. The perfume is infused with top notes of Yuzu, Pomegranate and Mint along with Peony, Lotus and Magnolia at its heart. At the base, Musk, Mahogany and Amber add the perfect balance, enhancing longevity for a sensual start to the day.
comment: This is a amazing perfume, very soothing scent . I would say this is a perfect perfume for your everyday use and special occasions, you would get compliments for sure. The fragrance is very long lasting, its presence can be felt all day.

product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

product_name: secret temptation Dream Eau de Parfum - 50 ml  (For Women)
description: Secret Affirmation: This is your year of dreams coming true! Whether you are a delicate floral girl, or a fruity, free-spirited kind, let Secret Temptation Dream help you to define the person you truly are. Its floral-fruity fragrance is what you need to make your presence felt and go to every edge to fulfil your every dream. Crafted from the bloom of natural fresh flowers and aromatic fruity scent keep you feeling bold and confident all day long. Wear this enticing women’s perfume to a work, board meeting and special meetings and shine with your vivacious spirit! Floating on a cloud of fruity top notes and floral freshness, spritz this perfume to drive your confidence to fly high, knowing, you can make all your dreams come true. It burst with top fresh citrus notes of bergamot, lemon, plum, apple; settles into a delicate floral heart of lilac, rose, ylang and ever so pleasing lily of the valley, trails of exquisite sandal musk notes complete the fragrance. You just need a little dash of this fragrance on your pulse points, inner wrist and nape for an everlasting impression all day long.
comment: Light and awesome fragrance best packaging reasonable price bottle is so beautiful

product_name: Engage One Soul Perfume, Long Lasting, Citrus and Spicy, Ideal for Gifting, Tester Free Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: Inspired by the blue skies and open spaces, Engage One Soul is a gender free and long lasting perfume which is a radically fresh composition of sparkling citrus & crisp aromatic spicy notes blended with smooth amber & woods. The fragrance is ideal for everyday use, casual meetings, brunch dates, parties, gifting etc. Apply the fragrance directly on neck and wrists (pulse points), let it dry on skin without rubbing. Can be used on both body and clothes.

description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists

product_name: RAMSONS EXOTICA. Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: Exotica : Ramsons Exotica is a mesmerising floral coalescence of jasmine, rose, and lily. This woody aroma is enriched with a base of musk, amber and vanilla. Ramsons Exotica is a honey-infused sweet-smelling fragrance with a punch of plum, peach, and orange that can last all day long. If you love the fragrance of flowers, then try this eau de parfum from Ramsons. Features • Woody, floral and sweet-smelling fragrance • Popular among men and women • Assures long-lasting freshness About the brand: Ramsons is one of India’s leading perfumery brands that cater to all segments of society, thanks to its exotic array of long-lasting aromas. It offers an exquisite range of office-wear perfumes to fragrances that can add zest to your romantic dates. Ramsons boasts of a rich repertoire for men and women. A scent of authenticity characterises the brand. Ramsons perfumes are thoughtfully designed, keeping in mind the diverse taste of its esteemed customer base.

Ramsons Exotica is a honey-infused sweet-smelling fragrance with a punch of plum, peach, and orange that can last all day long. If you love the fragrance of flowers, then try this eau de parfum from Ramsons. Features • Woody, floral and sweet-smelling fragrance • Popular among men and women • Assures long-lasting freshness About the brand: Ramsons is one of India’s leading perfumery brands that cater to all segments of society, thanks to its exotic array of long-lasting aromas. It offers an exquisite range of office-wear perfumes to fragrances that can add zest to your romantic dates. Ramsons boasts of a rich repertoire for men and women. A scent of authenticity characterises the brand. Ramsons perfumes are thoughtfully designed, keeping in mind the diverse taste of its esteemed customer base.

product_name: BOMBAY SHAVING COMPANY Mexico Perfume| Premium Fragrance Gift| Oriental & Woody Eau de Toilette - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: The premium blend of fragrances from Bombay Shaving Company. Mexico's exquisite blend of scents is a bold concoction of Citric and Woody notes that evoke freshness with a hint of playful charm. With Musk, Vetiver as the base notes and Bergamot, Neroli, and Lemon as the top notes, this perfume is perfect for someone, who likes everything classy. Its finely crafted fragrance creates an aura of extraordinary elegance. Switch things up with this exquisite fragrance from Bombay Shaving Company.
comment: value for money , good fragrance , long lasting , must buy

product_name: Bellavita CEO MAN Eau De Parfum,Long Lasting Notes of Tonka,Agarwood & Ambergris Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: 'Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. This perfume honours your debonair and charismatic personality, allowing you to be true to yourself, just with the 'CEO' touch added to it! "
comment: Great perfume at this price . Absolutely value for money.

product_name: SKINN by TITAN Raw Eau de Parfum - 50 ml  (For Men)
description: The first shower of rain on a hot summer day is synonymous with freshness, bringing about a sense of rejuvenation. Raw draws its inspiration from this, carefully balancing the fresh with the bold. This fragrance is created with crisp citrus notes that exude vitality and the warm woody notes that reflect masculinity, the top notes of this being fresh and crisp. Citrus notes such as bergamot and lemon from Italy, with a watery effect, will give you freshness to clear your mind. The heart notes of Raw bring true distinction with floral tones, and violet leaves, and geranium. The dry down of Raw will rest on your skin all day long. A blend of beautiful woods. A precious combination of Patchouli from Indonesia, and Gaiac wood.It is skin-friendly since it is dermatologically tested.
comment: The best among all the indian brands. Though not quite indian as the perfume is made in france by Cosmopar (a renowned cosmetic brand). it is packaged & marketed by Titan. The perfume is long lasting & has very spicy & earthy tone. For sure it will make an impression. A must have for the collection.

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum Fire 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Spread the FIRE around with an aromatic woody blend of patchouli, opulent spices & white musk. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE FIRE EDP's unique blend of woody and musky notes makes it ideal for use at a date night or an all night party with friends. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists.
comment: Amazing perfume with noticeable fragrance, the quality is very good with long lasting refreshing fragrance, really happy with my purchase.

product_name: Bellavita Glam Perfume for Woman with Fresh and Romantic Scent Perfume - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: Unconventional-Eccentric-Versatile. The Glam Woman Eau De Parfum celebrates versatility breaking conventional floral accents. Powerful Jasmine brings out the feminine character like no other; Classy and glamourous yet understated with fresh hints of citrusy orange and calming like white honey! It is an indulgent fragrance that is sensual and so full of character that it is almost impossible to miss! A quintessential Glam Woman is daring, a real head turner and with her magnetic force she makes sure to stand out from the crowd. P.S. 'Glamour' never takes a day off.

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

product_name: Bellavita Ros� Eau De Parfum With Long Lasting Floral Fragrance For Women Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: An iconic bouquet of rose, jasmine and peach, capturing the essence of classic romance. The Rose Woman Eau De Parfum essentially changes the way you think about roses forever! The woody Rose evolves singularly in the field of floral peach, jasmine and amber, breathing excitement and contentment! The aromatic perfume unfolds into the whiff of medieval England as pink pepper comes in contact with citrusy orange. Heart notes of woody rose mirrors true and classic romance, gently seducing base notes of Vanilla and Musk to evolve for a blooming ever after!
comment: If you are a perfume lover this is the product for you. You get a long lasting fragrance for a very affordable price. They are super long lasting, you will not have to apply them after couple of hours, use once a day and smell all the day.it smells so fresh and overall an amazing product.

product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

Finally, Musk, Ambergris, and Patchouli wrap it up, giving you a boost of confidence that lasts all day long. You'll be radiating confidence from dawn till dusk with the bolder and bossier, CEO Man Intense.

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum ICE 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists
comment: The perfume is very nice and has a very pleasant fragrance. Its's provide a cooling effect. It is last long all day. Best for office and casual day.. must buy

product_name: Wild Stone CODE Pyro Long Lasting Premium Perfume for Men | Gift For Men | Luxury Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Are you a man of mystery, fiercely independent and unwilling to conform to the ordinary? Then Code Pyro Perfume is the scent for you. This fragrance is tailored for the free-spirited man who dares to be different, and who refuses to be tamed. The scent opens with the bold and invigorating top notes of bergamot and Sichuan pepper, magnifying your presence and commanding attention. As it develops, the heart notes of leather, nutmeg, and patchouli blend together to create a woody, sophisticated, and vibrant aroma that's sure to turn heads. The base notes of amber, labdanum, tonka, and vanilla add a refreshing and alluring finish. PYRO is the perfect fragrance for the man who isn't afraid to make a statement, and who wants to leave a lasting impression. With PYRO, you'll be the centre of attention, and you'll be remembered for your daring, charismatic, and unforgettable persona. So why settle for the ordinary, when you can be extraordinary with PYRO. Be the spark that lights up every room, and ignite the passion of those around you. Light up your world with this daring, charismatic fragrance today.
comment: Fragrance Ok ok. But very long lasting. Good summer perfume

product_name: RAMSONS Midnight A night to remember Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: Midnight : Ramsons Midnight is an enchanting blend of oakmoss, patchouli, musk and amber, with a touch of minty and floral feel. A punch of camphor, lemongrass, and lavender complimented by rose, jasmine, and spice in the heart make this sweet-smelling fragrance a midnight delight. Relish this exotically enthralling eau de parfum from Ramsons. Features • Popular among all age groups • Suitable for all day use • Floral, herbal, and minty aroma About the brand: Ramsons is one of India’s leading perfumery brands that cater to all segments of society, thanks to its exotic array of long-lasting aromas. It offers an exquisite range of office-wear perfumes to fragrances that can add zest to your romantic dates. Ramsons boasts of a rich repertoire for men and women. A scent of authenticity characterises the brand. Ramsons perfumes are thoughtfully designed, keeping in mind the diverse taste of its esteemed customer base.

product_name: Bellavita CEO MAN Eau De Parfum,Long Lasting Notes of Tonka,Agarwood & Ambergris Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: 'Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. This perfume honours your debonair and charismatic personality, allowing you to be true to yourself, just with the 'CEO' touch added to it! "
comment: Great perfume at this price . Absolutely value for money.

product_name: FRENCH ESSENCE Luxury Passion Scent With Long Lasting Fragrance For Ladies Eau de Parfum - 30 ml  (For Women)
description: French Essence Luxury Passion a scent that perfectly captures the essence of seduction and sophistication. Enchanting Aroma: Passion has a lovely blend of fruity and floral tones that make for an entrancing aroma that lasts all day. Its pleasant and alluring perfume is produced by the well-balanced composition, which blends the sweetness of fruits with the grace of blooms. Long-Lasting: This perfume's ability to endure a long time is one of its best qualities. With a few spritzes in the morning, you may simply transition from day to night and feel fragrant and fresh all day. Versatile Elegance: Passion is a scent that works well for a variety of settings. It works just as well for a laid-back day at work, a special occasion where you want to make an impression, or a romantic evening out.
comment: Outstanding fragrance . Has mild passionate smell leaving a refreshing feeling . Can be used both during daytime and for party evenings too.

product_name: Bellavita CEO Woman Eau De Parfum with Vanilla, Musky & Woody Fragrance Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: Temptingly Decadent - Alluring - Daring. An ode to audacity standing the test of time! With powerful accents of bergamot and patchouli, the CEO Woman is both timeless yet modern! Its aqueous notes transpires fluidly to take on new horizons and celebrate existing ones. Its hint of musk and earthy notes of leather, tonka and vanilla makes it irresistible throughout the day! This iconic perfume makes a sophisticated statement as earthy, sweet and spicy notes harmoniously leave a captivating effect. The charming fragrance is for the bold and empowered woman who is on the road to scaling new heights
comment: Wow, this smells luxurious and expensive. Gives a boss lady feeling. I love perfumes which are unique, long lasting, floral and spicy. When you spray it smells strong, but just give it 5 mins, it dries down to a beautiful seductive fragrance. It's perfect for evening and date night. Just go for it..the packaging is solid. Easy to spray. Nice glass bottle. Value for money.

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: RIYA Bindas Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: The Riya perfumes have made a mark and I have been using it from quite long time. Since it is an Indian perfume you need to spray a bit more in comparison to the International Ones. The duration will be anywhere between 4-5 hours. Do not expect to last more if you just spray once. This is mainly for Men and has nice fragrance.

description: The Riya perfumes have made a mark and I have been using it from quite long time. Since it is an Indian perfume you need to spray a bit more in comparison to the International Ones. The duration will be anywhere between 4-5 hours. Do not expect to last more if you just spray once. This is mainly for Men and has nice fragrance.

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

product_name: Engage Luxury Perfume Gift Set, Travel Sized, Assorted Pack, Ideal for Gifting Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: Engage Yang is a perfect blend of fruity and floral notes, making it perfect for any woman who wants to reveal her sophisticated femininity. Top notes of blackcurrant, mandarin, and apple give it a juicy and lively opening, while the middle notes of jasmine, rose, and orange flowers add a romantic and floral depth. As it dries down, the bottom notes of musk and sandalwood give it a warm and alluring finish. Engage Femme is a premium perfume with fresh peppy citrus notes on an aromatic floral base, warmed by a base of amber and woods that celebrates femininity. Engage Fantasia is a premium, long lasting perfume for women inspired by the dynamic characteristics of a woman. The citrusy notes at the top mingle with violet leaf abs to give a powerful kickstart. The florals and spices at the heart pay homage to the capturing aroma of the night flower. Tonka beans abs and vanilla at the base makes the fragrance memorable. Perfect fragrance for special occasions like social or formal events, dates, evenings and ideal for gifting. Inspired by citrus grooves, Engage Verona is a premium, long lasting perfume for women. With fruity and citrusy blast of freshness at the top, floral and spicy notes at the heart adding playfulness and woody and musky notes at the base making the senses feel ezquisite, the perfume brings joy and radiance. The fragrance is ideal for everyday use, casual meetings, brunch dates, gifting etc. Apply the fragrance directly on neck and wrists (pulse points), let it dry on skin without rubbing. Can be used on both body and clothes.

product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. product_name: Engage Verona Perfume,Long Lasting,Citrus and Fruity,Ideal for Everyday Use,Tester Free Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: Inspired by citrus grooves, Engage Verona is a premium, long lasting perfume for women. With fruity and citrusy blast of freshness at the top, floral and spicy notes at the heart adding playfulness and woody and musky notes at the base making the senses feel ezquisite, the perfume brings joy and radiance. The fragrance is ideal for everyday use, casual meetings, brunch dates, gifting etc. Apply the fragrance directly on neck and wrists (pulse points), let it dry on skin without rubbing. Can be used on both body and clothes.

product_name: PureSense Opulence Gift Set (Hearts + Sweet + Passion + Love) 4x25ml Perfume - 100 ml  (For Women)

description: Splash into a sea of freshness with OCEAN Man. An aquatic fragrance, OCEAN opens with the fresh energy of citrus notes. OCEAN keeps you calm as you travel, work or play.

description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists

With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists

product_name: Bellavita BLU MEN Perfume with Lemon, Mandarin & Black Pepper Notes|Long Lasting Scent| Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: BLU Man is for those who love the water, the waves and the me time. Wear it to start your journey of solo exploration as you enjoy the fresh, calm outdoors. Feel calm and confident as the world admires your easy-going attitude. Feel refreshed with the top notes of lemon, nutmeg, mandarin and black pepper. Heart notes of apple, orris and pineapple make BLU captivating while the base notes of musk, vetiver, amber and moss add to its intensity, which lasts.
comment: Very nice budget perfume.. the first note is essentially lemony and woodsy.. lasts good.. for 7-8 hours. Good for daily use

description: Steal the show with RENEE's luxurious combo of premium and long-lasting perfumes in sleek travel-friendly sizes.
