comment:
The perfume comes in a set of four bottles, each containing 15ml. Unfortunately, the longevity of the scent is not impressive, lasting at most an hour. Despite receiving positive reviews, especially for Blossom and Desire, the scents are not as strong as expected. Red Noir has a distinct scent, but overall, the fragrances are feeble and not long-lasting. While it could be an option for a compact gift, it's not suitable for daily use. The scents are subjective, but they may not meet everyone's...

product_name: Bellavita CEO MAN Eau De Parfum,Long Lasting Notes of Tonka,Agarwood & Ambergris Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: 'Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. This perfume honours your debonair and charismatic personality, allowing you to be true to yourself, just with the 'CEO' touch added to it! "

product_name: BEARDO Godfather & Whisky Smoke EDP Perfume 50ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: THE LITERAL SMELL OF SOPHISTICATION! Your quest for rare, exotic, and distinctive fragrance ends with Beardo Whiskey Smoke Eau De Parfum for men. This artisanal perfume features a unique blend of fragrance from Whiskey along with exotic Oud wood, Tobacco, Cinnamon and indulgent Vanilla. To call this perfume strong and long-lasting would be an understatement, this fragrance is for them who want to get noticed and make bold entrances wherever they go. BEGIN YOUR RULE. Be prepared to captivate the senses of one and all with the powerful enigma of Beardo Godfather EDP. Beardo Godfather perfume has an alluring and authoritative appeal that instantly overshadows ordinary perfumes. Beardo Godfather is created to be versatile for all occasions, yet it is sure to make you stand out. Its unique and powerful scent is fit to be used during day as well as night. It is a unique combination of citrus and spicy notes which make it fit for all seasons too.

description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum Fire 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Spread the FIRE around with an aromatic woody blend of patchouli, opulent spices & white musk. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE FIRE EDP's unique blend of woody and musky notes makes it ideal for use at a date night or an all night party with friends. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists.
comment: Amazing perfume with noticeable fragrance, the quality is very good with long lasting refreshing fragrance, really happy with my purchase.

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

comment: This is the second consecutive time I am buying this product and there is absolutely no regrets. product_name: DAVIDOFF Cool Water Reborn for him Eau de Toilette - 125 ml  (For Men)
description: They say you only live once. But they never say how many times you can be reborn. Davidoff Cool Water emerges reborn. Discover COOL WATER REBORN for him, where the aromatic rosemary blends with the elegant sensuality of vetiver.

product_name: SKINN by TITAN Celeste - Single Pack Eau de Parfum - 20 ml  (For Women)
description: Celeste evokes the liveliness of a spring garden, with white floral notes and a touch of zing from peaches and pears. The dry sandalwood flirts with unexpected hints of patchouli. Celeste was designed as a reflection of a playful mood, coupled with a flair for charming mischief. A very modern, joyful and feminine fragrance from the floral family. From the very first notes, this fragrance reveals a playful floral nectar heart of exotic white flowers: exotic and sensual jasmine sambac flower, suave and irresistible orange flower, tuberose and delicate, refreshing waterlily. This heart is surrounded by a very luminous and sparkling fruity top notes with touches of mandarin and grapefruit, juicy green pear, invigorating ginger and velvety mouthwatering white peach. This is followed by a very creamy dry down composed of fruity apricot nectar, reinforcing sensuality, sensual sandalwood, patchouli, and reinforced by precious white musks.It is skin-friendly since it is dermatologically tested.

there was a huge difference in the quality.

product_name: FRENCH ESSENCE Luxury Charm Scent With Long Lasting Fragrance For Ladies Eau de Parfum - 30 ml  (For Women)
description: Charm by French Essence Luxury, a scent that perfectly captures the essence of seduction and sophistication. Enchanting Aroma: Charm has a lovely blend of fruity and floral tones that make for an entrancing aroma that lasts all day. Its pleasant and alluring perfume is produced by the well-balanced composition, which blends the sweetness of fruits with the grace of blooms. Long-Lasting: This perfume's ability to endure a long time is one of its best qualities. With a few spritzes in the morning, you may simply transition from day to night and feel fragrant and fresh all day. Versatile Elegance: Charm is a scent that works well for a variety of settings. It works just as well for a laid-back day at work, a special occasion where you want to make an impression, or a romantic evening out.

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum ICE 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists

product_name: MOODY Perfume Gift Set of 4 Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Elevate your every day with these fragrances that last up to 8 hours, so you smell amazing all day long. This set offers four unique scents, perfect for the trendy woman who loves switching up her vibes: 1> Woodland Blossom: Tropical and Fresh, making it perfect for everyday workwear. 2> White Musk and Rose: Sweet and Musky, an ideal choice for brunch and shopping. 3> Strawberries and Champagne: Luxurious and sensual, a great companion for date nights. 4> Tropical Vanilla: Comforting and Sweet, perfect for evening events and parties. Crafted by one of the world's leading perfumers, each perfume in this collection is a high-quality Eau De Parfum (EDP) with 20% perfume oil, promising long-lasting and joyful scents. Whether it's for treating yourself or as a gift, these perfumes bring a touch of luxury to your daily routine.

This set offers four unique scents, perfect for the trendy woman who loves switching up her vibes: 1> Woodland Blossom: Tropical and Fresh, making it perfect for everyday workwear. 2> White Musk and Rose: Sweet and Musky, an ideal choice for brunch and shopping. 3> Strawberries and Champagne: Luxurious and sensual, a great companion for date nights. 4> Tropical Vanilla: Comforting and Sweet, perfect for evening events and parties. Crafted by one of the world's leading perfumers, each perfume in this collection is a high-quality Eau De Parfum (EDP) with 20% perfume oil, promising long-lasting and joyful scents. Whether it's for treating yourself or as a gift, these perfumes bring a touch of luxury to your daily routine.

product_name: BEARDO Dark Side & Godfather EDP Perfume Set of 2 Pcs | Strong & Long Lasting Fragrance Eau de Parfum - 40 ml  (For Men)
description: BEGIN YOUR RULE. Be prepared to captivate the senses of one and all with the powerful enigma of Beardo Godfather EDP. Beardo Godfather perfume has an alluring and authoritative appeal that instantly overshadows ordinary perfumes. Beardo Godfather is created to be versatile for all occasions, yet it is sure to make you stand out. Its unique and powerful scent is fit to be used during day as well as night. It is a unique combination of citrus and spicy notes which make it fit for all seasons too.

product_name: Bellavita CEO MAN Eau De Parfum,Long Lasting Notes of Tonka,Agarwood & Ambergris Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: 'Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. This perfume honours your debonair and charismatic personality, allowing you to be true to yourself, just with the 'CEO' touch added to it! "
comment: Great perfume at this price . Absolutely value for money.

Enjoy this overwhelmingly majestic eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Sweet”.

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.
comment:
Hii,I received the exactly same product which was displayed.
I gifted the perfume to my best friend on his birthday I got the very good review from him that he liked every fragrance in it and he thanked me to gifting such a good perfume.

product_name: RAMSONS La Opale (Authentic) Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: La Opale : Ramsons’ finely crafted body spray La Opale is an inseparable composition of musk, amber, vanilla, moss, and sandalwood at the base. At the heart, there is a flavour of spices and flowers, which gives a refreshing feel. This woody fragrance is infused with fruity essence of plum, apple, and grapefruit, with a dash of bergamot. Features • Popular among men and women • Made from rich ingredients like vanilla and sandalwood • Woody, floral, fruity, citric, and spicy aroma About the brand: Ramsons is one of the front-runners in the Indian deodorants’ market. Ramsons’ body sprays are known for their ever-lasting ability to exude a beautiful fragrance. Its exquisite collection of deodorants is crafted from finely selected ingredients that guarantee freshness all day long. Ramsons endeavours to constantly develop its magnificent range of body sprays by undertaking seamless research and development activities to offer the best to their customers.

description: La Opale : Ramsons’ finely crafted body spray La Opale is an inseparable composition of musk, amber, vanilla, moss, and sandalwood at the base. At the heart, there is a flavour of spices and flowers, which gives a refreshing feel. This woody fragrance is infused with fruity essence of plum, apple, and grapefruit, with a dash of bergamot. Its exquisite collection of deodorants is crafted from finely selected ingredients that guarantee freshness all day long. product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

product_name: BOMBAY SHAVING COMPANY Premium Perfume Gift Set 3 X 30 ml | Long Lasting Fragrance Eau de Parfum - 90 ml  (For Men)
description: Make the special moments unforgettable for him with wanderlust- the premium fragrance gift kit for men from Bombay Shaving Company. The three-fragrance kit is the perfect gift for your husband, father, brother or literally any man who likes to wear his mood on his sleeve. Mexico: Mexico's journey starts with Neroli, Lemon, and Bergamot which reminds you of the citrusy scent of Wild Bergamot that dots the Texas countryside during Summer. The leathery scent of teakwood perfectly contrasts with the spicy smell of rose. The alluring journey ends with the radical masculine notes of Musk and Vetiver. Cairo: Experience the mystic charm of aromatic spices with Cairo, which sends you to the secret alleys of desire. Get ready to charm with warm Cardamom, sweet Lavender and the woody scent of Leather; and become the talk of the town with the long-lasting touch of Vetiver and Vanilla. Miami: Miami is another name for celebrating life like there’s no tomorrow. It’s a fresh blast of fruity aromas with Lily of the Valley merging into the enigmatic Jasmine. Experience the sensational notes of Oriental spices, chasing the essence of illustrious Musk. A reputable brand with a history of producing high-quality perfumes, A variety of scents included in the set, allowing the recipient to try different fragrances and find their favorite perfect giftset for your loved one.

The leathery scent of teakwood perfectly contrasts with the spicy smell of rose. The alluring journey ends with the radical masculine notes of Musk and Vetiver. Cairo: Experience the mystic charm of aromatic spices with Cairo, which sends you to the secret alleys of desire. Get ready to charm with warm Cardamom, sweet Lavender and the woody scent of Leather; and become the talk of the town with the long-lasting touch of Vetiver and Vanilla. Miami: Miami is another name for celebrating life like there’s no tomorrow. It’s a fresh blast of fruity aromas with Lily of the Valley merging into the enigmatic Jasmine. Experience the sensational notes of Oriental spices, chasing the essence of illustrious Musk. A reputable brand with a history of producing high-quality perfumes, A variety of scents included in the set, allowing the recipient to try different fragrances and find their favorite perfect giftset for your loved one.

product_name: THE MAN COMPANY Tranquil| Long Lasting Perfume for Men Perfume - 50 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: The Man Company’s EAU De Parfum Tranquil is for the gentleman who enters every room with a calm aura and leaves a trail of tranquillity wherever he goes. The richness of this fragrance comes from high-quality essential oils that make it stay on you throughout the day. Allow the citrusy, floral and musky scent to lace you with a calm vibe, making every day a good day for you. When the first spritz lands on your body, you feel the refreshing Lemon, followed by the floral Lavender and right, in the end, you get uplifted by the aromatic Musk.

product_name: Engage Indigo Skies Perfume,Long Lasting,Fresh and Earthy,For Everyday Use,Tester Free Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Engage Indigo Skies is a premium, long lasting perfume for men which is a grand fusion of aromatic lavender & rich earthy woody notes with a sparkling diffusion of bergamot & spices that leaves a nostalgic lingering note on skin - a perfect conconction of mascuilinity an earthy facets. The fragrance is ideal for everyday use, casual meetings, brunch dates, gifting etc. Apply the fragrance directly on neck and wrists (pulse points), let it dry on skin without rubbing. Can be used on both body and clothes.

product_name: Bellavita KLUB MEN perfume with Notes of lemon, Pineapple & Apple |Long Lasting Fragrance| Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: KLUB Man inspires you to party to the fullest. Wear it to smell great through the night as you dance into the wee hours of the morning. Your companion for a great time, all the time. Top notes of lemon, pineapple, blackcurrant and apple pack a refreshing punch while heart notes of birch, jasmine and rose add freshness. Base notes of musk, amber, vanilla and patchouli make this a spicy, long lasting fragrance.

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum ICE 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE ICE EDP's unique blend of citrus and cedarwood notes makes it ideal for use as an everyday perfume for wearing it at work. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists

product_name: 7DAYS Passion Perfume for Men Eau de Parfum Perfume - 50 ml  (For Men)
description: Introducing Passion Eau De Parfum by 7 Days: Experience Luxury Unleash the power of “Passion” by 7 Days, an Eau De Parfum that is crafted to perfection, this fragrance is more than just a scent; it's an experience that energizes your spirit, leaving a lasting impression wherever you go. Passion by 7 Days is more than just a perfume; it's a statement. With its rich and captivating fragrance, it's your secret weapon for commanding attention and exuding confidence. This Eau De Parfum offers an instant burst of energy, giving you that extra edge to conquer your day with style and poise. Our perfume is meticulously formulated using high-quality essential oils, ensuring a fragrance that lingers throughout the day. Its iconic scent is the epitome of luxury, with the highest concentration of perfume oil, making you smell divine from dawn to dusk. Passion Eau De Parfum is your perfect companion for all the occasion. Its unique blend of notes caters to every mood and moment. Whether you're heading to a party or simply enjoying your daily routine, this fragrance complements your style effortlessly. Plus, it can be applied both on your body and clothes, making it a versatile choice. Passion comes in three exquisite notes, each adding its own dimension to the fragrance: Top Note: Lavender Oil, Citrus, and aromatic accord (Rosemary and basil oil) provide an instant energy boost, keeping you active and invigorated. Middle Note: Wood (excel floral note), geranium, and spearmint create a calming and cooling effect, ensuring you remain relaxed and composed. Base Note: Patchouli, leather accord, and oak moss accord infuse the fragrance with a woody confidence that boosts your self-assuredness. Passion is your go-to perfume, designed to elevate every moment of your life. Its long-lasting fragrance, luxurious feel with each spray, and easy portability make it a must-have for all skin types. Whether you're giving it as a gift or keeping it for yourself, our premium packaging adds that extra touch of sophistication. Bullet Points Elegance: Passion Eau De Parfum by 7 Days is a blend of citrus and aromatic notes, instantly boosting your energy and keeping you active throughout the day. Lasting Freshness: Crafted with high-quality essential oils, this perfume ensures a long-lasting, iconic scent, making you feel luxurious and confident from morning to night. Versatile Appeal: Suitable for daily use or special occasions, Passion can be applied on both body and clothes, adapting to your every mood and moment. Three Refreshing Notes: With top, middle, and base notes, it offers a multi-dimensional experience—energizing citrus, cooling marine, and confidence-boosting wood. Perfect for Gifting: Packaged in premium packaging, Passion Eau De Parfum is an ideal gift choice, encapsulating the essence of luxury, making it perfect for all occasions. How To Use Spray the perfume on your pulse points such as sides of the neck and wrists for all day freshness

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum Fire 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Spread the FIRE around with an aromatic woody blend of patchouli, opulent spices & white musk. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE FIRE EDP's unique blend of woody and musky notes makes it ideal for use at a date night or an all night party with friends. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists.
comment: Amazing perfume with noticeable fragrance, the quality is very good with long lasting refreshing fragrance, really happy with my purchase.

product_name: RAMSONS U R Sweet & Lovely Pack of 2 Eau de Parfum - 60 ml  (For Women)
description: Ramsons U.R.Sweet is an exuberant coalescence of amber, musk, sandalwood and vanilla at the base, enriched with honey and cinnamon at the heart. This sweet smelling fragrance is a fruity and floral delight exuding a captivating fragrance all day long. Enjoy this overwhelmingly majestic eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Sweet”. Ramsons U.R.Lovely is a testimony to floral exuberance thanks to its exotic fusion of jasmine, rose and tuberose at the heart. This woody and fresh fragrance has the finest quality of amber, musk and vanilla at the base, with a dash of green to make it more refreshing. Flaunt this unbelievably alluring eau de parfum from Ramsons which will give you the tag of “U.R.Lovely”.

product_name: DENVER Sporting Club EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: This fragrance is made for an outstanding men in the whole world. Compose of a fantastic blend of spices with musk. It is a perfect all time wear. Its fresh top notes blended with exotic spices and richness of geranium at heart with woody, musky base gives a complete look to the wearer. Rider:- It opens with sparkling and intense freshness of grapefruit , bergamot and lemon. It is enriched with rich florals and oakmoss in the heart while base contains sandalwood, tonka beans and musk. It would give you a feel of modern masculine and authentic fragrance. Victor:- A sparkling fresh mandarin and bergamot at the top make your day with intense freshness leading to a sensual profile at heart which is composed of rich florals and oakmoss . The base is enriched with woody blends ,musk and rich amber. Champ:- A very fresh masculine woody citrus aromatic fragrance for today’s youth to make him more confident and champion in all aspects of life.

Each fragrance evokes an essence of luxury fabrics like the softness of Silk, the lightness of Satin, the warmth of Chenille & the richness of Velvet. Each scent is a perfect match for modern, confident women and men who are not afraid to indulge in the finer things of life.

product_name: THE MAN COMPANY Black perfume Eau de Toilette - 50 ml  (For Men)
description: EDT or Eau de Toilette is your best pal. Whether you are travelling, going to the office for an urgent meeting, or spending a laid-back Sunday at a friend's place, a versatile EDT will never fail you. The perfume-based EDT is one of the most elite perfumes for men, launched by a brand recently. Travel-friendly, you can carry the EDT Black with you, anywhere. The 50ml bottle comes in a fascinating phial packing. A simple dab on the key points is enough for effect to set in. What makes it an obvious choice is the masculine undertone that remains with you for the rest of the day. Top Note: Lemon Lemon makes for a refreshing top note that keeps your spirit high and uplifted as soon as you wear the fragrance. Middle Note: Lavender Lavender has a calming floral note that gives your fragrance a fresh yet spicy feel. Base Note: Amberwood Amberwood is a masterpiece ingredient that adds a woody and powdery vibe to your perfume.

product_name: 7DAYS Mens Perfume Gift Set 6x15 ml Perfumes Luxury Scent with Long Lasting Fragrance Perfume - 90 ml  (For Men)
description: Unbox a treasure of little luxuries with our Unisex Luxury Perfume Set that makes for the perfect gift for everyone. An arsenal of indulgence, this box set carries some of 7DAYS Organic's most iconic fragrances. A little bit about the fragrances in the 7DAYS Organic Unisex Luxury Perfume Set: White Oud: The Spice Odyssey. Charmed by the tangy Artemisian Lemon at the top, freesias at its heart and amber at its base, The White Oud is a revelation of all things 'sweet' and 'spice'! WINNER: Exudes Freshness and Sophistication. Top note of bergamot fuses perfectly with Ambergis at its base and pink pepper at its heart. WINNER Eau De Cologne has a fresh appeal for the effortlessly sophisticated yet understatedly charming! Fresh: A mythical fragrance rephrasing ancient elegance. Top Bergamot note is accentuated by lavender at its heart and Ylang-Ylang at its base, manifesting an irresistibly iconic appeal. A breath of Fresh air, PASSION Eau De Toilette is full of purity and versatility! Patchouli: An exhilarating blend that transpires us into the Imperial apothecary. product_name: DENVER Hamilton EDP- SRK's Favorite Luxury Gift Pack- 20ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men)
description: Honour - This is a combination of notes that evoke strength and tenderness tradition and modernity. It opens with fresh citrus spicy notes followed by a musky signature with a base of sandal and amber. It gives you all that you need in a fragrance. Hamilton:- This fragrances is where your search ends. It consist of aromatic fresh green notes blended with spicy floral and is filled with mossy and balsamic woody leaving you fantastic all day long. Imperial : This is a fresh and sensual blend of notes with juiciness of grapefruit at the top. Middle notes are rose, Cinnamon and spices. Base notes are woody, musky and amber. Caliber : This is fresh woody and slightly oriental fragrance.It is an aromatic green top note well blended with Italian lemon with richness of Geranium and spicy notes in the middle. It is composed of Tonka mixed with amber and woody notes at the base.

product_name: Envy Blue Luxury Perfume Gift Set (20 ml x 4) Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Men & Women)
description: 1. Oud Luxure Experience the epitome of masculinity with Envy Oud Luxure, a premium fragrance carefully crafted with a touch of rose on an amber and animalic accord. Opening with notes of bergamot, cardamom, and cypress, it leads to an intense heart of Agar and Labdanum. The rich base of patchouli, vetiver, sandalwood, and musk completes this alluring composition. 2. Elegant Experience the allure of Envy Elegant, where fresh grapefruit and marine accord intertwine, revealing a heart of aromatic sweetness. Enriched with woody notes of patchouli, oakmoss, and amber, this fragrance exudes elegance and sophistication. 3. Vivid Ignite your senses with Envy Vivid, a masculine fragrance that combines sharp lavender, citrus, spicy berries, and the warmth of sandalwood. This invigorating blend evokes a vibrant energy and embodies the essence of strength and vitality. 4. Brave Embrace the modern and authentic scent of Envy Brave. Its sparkling freshness, courtesy of grapefruit, bergamot, and lemon, is complemented by a bouquet of rich florals and oakmoss at its heart. The base, featuring sandalwood, tonka beans, and musk, exudes a sense of masculine confidence that leaves a lasting impression.

product_name: SKINN by TITAN Steele - Single Pack Eau de Parfum - 20 ml  (For Men)
description: Steele creates a magnetic impression that combines charisma with confidence. The explosive fresh accords enhanced with earthy spices evoke an enviable, yet effortless charm. This perfume bottles a larger than life seduction with charismatic woody undertones, sharp hints of pepper and the unique class of vanilla. The top notes reveal a very powerful, explosive fresh accord of sparkling, fizzy citrus as bergamot and pink grapefruit essences, are blended with an original fruity green rhubarb note. These top notes enhance the magnetic effect of this fragrance from the beginning. The heart evokes elegance and movement thanks to the duo of a spicy original accord of pink pepper, pimento, nutmeg mixed with the floral notes of geranium, and woody note. The complex background and dry down evoke extremely refined seductiveness thanks to the woody undertones of cedar wood that are blended with smoky touches of patchouli, sweet vanilla, praline, benzoin, leather, and rich roasted tonka beans. It is skin-friendly since it is dermatologically tested.
comment: Strong punch but not long lasting

product_name: MyGlamm LIT XOXO Fragrance-Sassy Perfume - 25 ml  (For Women)

For whatever your language of love may be, these 5 enchanting fragrances sets will have your back. Flirt with ‘em all or spritz your fave muse on the way to meet your significant other! Mark your first impression with a sweet love note and leave the aromatic signature blend lingering as you depart.

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum ICE 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Cut through the crowd like ICE with an aromatic citrus blend of bergamot, orange blossom & cedarwood. product_name: PARK AVENUE Voyage EDP Eau de Parfum - 50 ml  (For Men)
description: Presenting All eau-de-partum, the latest offering from the master perfumers at Park Avenue. With its powerful and masculine features combined together, this esp. has strong and invigorating notes of amber intertwined with mandarin, with a hint of woody and musky notes. It opens with a fresh citrus and mandarin note followed by a sweet, spicy like nutmeg and cinnamon. Its 3 layered notes unwrap with time and its the perfect companion for a man obsessed with new voyages!.

product_name: Ajmal Aretha Eau de Parfum-100 ml Floral Perfume (For Women) Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Women)
description: Wear Aretha when you want to get into the flow of the moment, without creating a storm. Perfect day fragrance! The presence of juicy peach and crispy pear in the top notes lends a weightless freshness to this fruity floral composition. At the heart lies the sweet opulence of honeysuckles, white and yellow flowers that bloom on hardy bushes mingles with softness of Bulgarian roses to great a magical alchemy

product_name: Bellavita CEO MAN Eau De Parfum,Long Lasting Notes of Tonka,Agarwood & Ambergris Perfume - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: 'Life in the Fast Lane! Perfect for everyday wear, CEO MAN Eau De Parfum elevates the 'CEO' in you. Refreshingly daring yet long-lasting with top hints of lemon and sugar delicately energising with Lavendar at its heart and finally, arise the vetiver, moss and tonka's sharply-dressed base. This perfume honours your debonair and charismatic personality, allowing you to be true to yourself, just with the 'CEO' touch added to it! "
comment: Great perfume at this price . Absolutely value for money.

You can go for it.

product_name: VANESA Luxury Perfume Gift Set For Women 20 ml x 4 Set Eau de Parfum - 80 ml  (For Women)
description: Specially designed Vanesa Luxury range of perfumes with Floral, Fruity, Woody and Oriental notes that will boost your personality and Style for a perfect occasion. Pack of 4 Luxury fragrances ENIGMA :- Cradle your eminence in this world of ordinary, let the abundance of your enigmatic persona float with this bold fragrance. MAGIC PEARL :- Own the elegance and class that you are, spread the magic around you to be the conqueror with this Magical fragrance. BABE :- Vanesa Babe Perfume is infused with the exotic blend of aromatic extracts that leaves behind a mesmerizing fragrance. Be a Babe with glamour and Style! CAPER :- Intuitive, Elegant, Infused with emotions for every special occasion specially designed for a woman of panache. Caper hooks you with a melody of appealing and irresistible Floral, Fresh notes all day long HOW TO USE Tips to make your scent last. 1. Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

Applying perfume is probably the last step in your beauty routine, a sprits here, a dab there & you are out. 2. Don’t rub perfume into your skin. 3. Spray it on your pulse points (Inside of your wrists, inner elbows, below your belly button, behind your ear lobes, and the back of your knees) Spritz, then walk into your perfume Feel free to spray your clothes

product_name: SET WET Signature Eau de Parfum Fire 100 ml Eau de Parfum - 100 ml  (For Men)
description: Youthful Dreams, Mature Tastes : Experience the ultimate fusion of passion and poise with the NEW SET WET SIGNATURE range. With SET WET SIGNATURE Perfume for men, Spread the FIRE around with an aromatic woody blend of patchouli, opulent spices & white musk. With a carefully formulated blend of premium ingredients, SET WET SIGNATURE Eau de Parfum offers long lasting fragrance that lingers throughout the day ensuring you leave a trail of elegance in your wake. SET WET SIGNATURE FIRE EDP's unique blend of woody and musky notes makes it ideal for use at a date night or an all night party with friends. Housed in a beautifully designed, equisite bottle, our EDP is as visually captivating as its scent. Its a perfect addition to your fragrance collection and an elegant accessory on your vanity. For long lasting effect, spray on your pulse points including the collar bones, behind the ears and wrists.
comment: Amazing perfume with noticeable fragrance, the quality is very good with long lasting refreshing fragrance, really happy with my purchase.

product_name: FRENCH ESSENCE Luxury Recharge Perfume With Long Lasting Fragrance Scent For Gents Eau de Parfum - 60 ml  (For Men)
description: French Essence Luxury Perfume - Recharge captures the essence of vitality and energy. Unleash Your Inner Power: Recharge is not just a fragrance; it's a statement. Whether you're heading to an important meeting, a social gathering, or simply conquering daily challenges, this perfume accompanies you with an aura of vibrancy. Quality Craftsmanship: At French Essence, we believe in the art of fragrance creation. Our perfumers meticulously select the finest ingredients to craft each note, resulting in a balanced and captivating composition. The sleek and sophisticated bottle design reflects the elegance of the fragrance within. A Perfume for Every Occasion: French Essence Luxury Perfume - Recharge effortlessly transitions from day to night, making it suitable for various occasions. Its energizing character makes it perfect for morning meetings, while its subtle complexity lends itself to evenings out. Embrace the Charge: Embrace the revitalizing power of French Essence Luxury Perfume - Recharge and make a lasting impression wherever you go. Experience the essence of dynamism with every spray of French Essence Luxury Perfume - Recharge.
